Complete collection of species for D&D 5e 2024 A customizable triptych containing all available species from D&D 5e 2024. Each card presents the characteristics, racial traits, and particularities of each species. Contents: All species from D&D 5e 2024 High-quality cards with detailed illustrations Complete information: traits, bonuses, special abilities 5e 2024 Compatible Customization options: Selection of specific species according to your needs Triptych format for elegant presentation Individual cards available Create your character instantly with all information at your fingertips!
